attributes.action: End the unjust Tv Licence Fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lets put a End to the Tv Licence fees,Its about time the BBC paid for its self by allowing adverts,and stopped making The Public pay to watch Tv ,We are fed up with this unjust fee,its only one tv company after all,We dont see how Making the BBC pay its own way  would 
effect the independence of the BBC,Come on this is 2007 its time to put a stop to this outdated Charge!(The Dictionary  gives(in part) the meaning of the word Licence as A Document giving official Permission to do something ;Why do we in this day and age need Permission to watch TV?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
